quote: "Love the life you live. Live the life you love." Bob Marley

step_of_the_day.title: What do you love about the life you are living. Identifying what makes you happy (Pillar #6)
step_of_the_day.content:
It might seem strange to be talking about the life you love during this terrible crisis we are all going
            through. We are in lock down, unable to do so many of the things we enjoy. Many of us have been touched by
            death and illness as well as economic hardship. It can be very daunting. While upset and upsetting feelings should not be ignored, it is also important to find a way to balance the
            hardship with the reasons for being alive. I have talked about the value of positive emotions. Including how
            they actually improve the functioning of your heart. I have also shared that the Dalai Lama has said that
            the purpose of life is to be happy.

action_step:
Find something to be happy about today. Identify what you love about the life you are living and take a
            moment to appreciate it.
journal_entry: Write about what you love about your life and what you do to bring that more into your life.
